## Node.Traversal.flattened variable

When set, traverse the flattened element tree rooted at the node.

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/\#flat-tree](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/#flat-tree)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
flattened: Flag
```
